code: var shorten=function shorten(title){var splitedTitle=title.split(" ");var newTitle="".concat(splitedTitle[0]," ").concat(splitedTitle[1]);return newTitle;};var isInCart=function isInCart(state,id){var result=!!state.selectedItems.find(function(item){return item.id===id;});return result;};var quantityCount=function quantityCount(state,id){var index=state.selectedItems.findIndex(function(item){return item.id===id;});if(index===-1){return false;}else{return state.selectedItems[index].quantity;}};export{shorten,isInCart,quantityCount};
